Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can include light or sound as a method of communication between the two students.
The student can use only the materials depicted in the drawing to show how the string telephone is made.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone helps the students talk to each other from far away.
The student can highlight the important features of the string telephone, such as the two cups and connecting string.
